channel.title: Microsoft on my tech ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft on my tech ramblings

item.title: Announcing dotnetramblings.com or how to build a .NET news aggregator site
item.description: Let's check how I build my new site www.dotnetramblings.com. This site is a .NET news aggregator that updates its content every three hours. The main technologies employed to build it include Hugo, Python and Github Actions.
